briefTitle: Satisfaction Survey for the Outpatient Unit Dedicated to Post-cancer Treatment
officialTitle: Satisfaction Survey for the Outpatient Unit Dedicated to Post-cancer Treatment
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Satisfaction reported by patients regarding the implementation of UMAb post breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient whose age is ≥ 18 years
* Patient who has participated in post-cancer UMAB for breast cancer
* French-speaking patient

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient under guardianship or curatorship
* Patient deprived of liberty
* Patient under court protection
* Patient objecting to the use of her data for this research
